revised_title: Megaspore Development and Chromosome Linkage in Oenothera Species
tldr: This study investigates the development of megaspores and chromosome linkage in Oenothera species. The researchers found that chromosome linkage is constant within each species and mutant, and that this constancy contributes to the breeding behavior of small-flowered species. The study also provides a detailed account of the meiosis process in the megaspore mother-cell and the development of the four potential megaspores.
